<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_484</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_484</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Sistemas de Cramer. Interpretación geométrica.</string>
            <string language="en">Cramer systems. Geometrical interpretation.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cramer Systeme. Geometrische Deutung.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Systèmes de Cramer. Traduction 
géométrique.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistemas de Cramer. Interpretação 
geométrica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistemi di Cramer. Interpretazione 
geometrica.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συστήματα Cramer. Γεωμετρική ερμηνεία.</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la resolución de un sistema de ecuaciones de Cramer. Se estudia la forma de resolver un sistema de Cramer y se da una demostración geométrica, utilizando vectores, de la regla de Cramer.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to teach the student how to solve a Cramer system of linear equations. It also gives a geometric proof of Cramer's rule using vectors.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sistemas</string>
            <string language="en">systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">vectores</string>
            <string language="en">vectors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regla de Cramer</string>
            <string language="en">Cramer's rule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">determinantes</string>
            <string language="en">determinants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">demostración</string>
            <string language="en">proof</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch Simulationen, 
dem Kursteilnehmer beizubringen, wie man ein Cramer System der 
linearen Gleichungen löst. Es gibt auch einen geometrischen 
Beweis von Richtlinie Cramers mit Vektoren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations simulations 
d'enseigner à l'étudiant comment résoudre un système de Cramer des
équations linéaires. Il fournit également des preuves 
géométriques de la règle de Cramer en utilisant des vecteurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações ensinar ao 
estudante como resolver um sistema de Cramer de equações lineares. 
Dá também uma prova geométrica da régua de Cramer usando 
vetores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni insegnare 
all'allievo come risolvere un sistema di Cramer delle equazioni 
lineari. Egualmente dà una prova geometrica della regola del 
Cramer usando i vettori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να διδάξει το σπουδαστή πώς να λύσει ένα σύστημα Cramer 
των γραμμικών εξισώσεων. Δίνει επίσης μια γεωμετρική 
απόδειξη του κανόνα Cramer χρησιμοποιώντας τα διανύσματα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Systeme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vektoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtlinie Cramers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bestimmende Faktoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beweis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systèmes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vecteurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La règle de Cramer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">causes déterminantes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">preuve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistemas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regola del Cramer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fattori determinanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
